messages.speech:
üôà Take cover (e. g. under a sturdy table) and keep calm
üß± Beware of falling objects (e. g. shelves, heavy furniture, televisions, stereos and light fittings) and keep away from windows and glass walls, which may shatter
üè¢ Only leave the building when the surrounding area is safe (when there are no more falling objects such as roof tiles, etc.)
